content.text:
# Draft:Tulip (Retail Software)

[https://www.tulip.com/ Tulip] is a retail technology company founded in 2013 by Ali Asaria. Its platform is used by major global retailers to enhance omnichannel commerce and personalize customer service. Tulip's approach to brick-and-mortar retail was analyzed in a [https://www.forbes.com/sites/forbestreptalks/2017/11/14/tulip-retail-thinks-it-can-save-brick-and-mortar-and-become-a-100-billion-business-really/ 2017 Forbes feature].
